code: import React from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AttendanceCard=_ref=>{let{record,onDelete}=_ref;const handleDelete=async()=>{if(window.confirm('Are you sure you want to delete this attendance record?')){await onDelete(record.id);}};const formatDate=dateString=>{return new Date(dateString).toLocaleDateString('en-US',{weekday:'short',year:'numeric',month:'short',day:'numeric'});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"attendance-card ".concat(record.status.toLowerCase()),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card-header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:record.employeeName}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"status-badge ".concat(record.status.toLowerCase()),children:record.status})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card-body",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Employee ID:"})," ",record.employeeID]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Date:"})," ",formatDate(record.date)]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Recorded:"})," ",new Date(record.timestamp).toLocaleString()]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"card-footer",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"delete-btn",onClick:handleDelete,title:"Delete record",children:"\uD83D\uDDD1\uFE0F Delete"})})]});};export default AttendanceCard;
